name: Machine Learning+IoT Agriculture Aplication
desc: I created a website integrated with machine learning YOLO and CNN for detecting maize plant diseases, equipped with IoT for garden monitoring.

name: Scale for Impaired people
desc: I created a scale with voice output to assist visually impaired people

name: IoT-based Automatic CCTV
desc: I created a CCTV that automatically takes photos of objects using ESP32 with a PIR sensor and Firebase as the database.

name: Oil viscosity measuring instrument
desc: I created a used cooking oil viscosity detection device using a magnetic sensor for biodiesel based on the Internet of Things

name: Heart rate and body temperature monitoring
desc: I created a device for detecting heart rate and body temperature using the MAX100 sensor and the Ubidots platform for remote monitoring.

name: Robot Arm IoT
desc: I created a 3-DOF robotic arm that can move objects based on their color using inverse kinematics and a website for monitoring.

name: A stove for cooking palm sap and a Brix meter.
desc: I created a tool for cooking palm sap (over 100 KG) and an automatic Brix value calculator to process it into palm sugar, based on the Internet of Things.

name: An automatic laundry machine with receipt printing
desc: I developed a machine for automated laundry services, where users simply place their dirty clothes on a scale, input their name, the number of clothes, and the desired laundry service speed. Then, the billing receipt is printed automatically, and the customer data is stored in the owner's database.

name: A facial moisture monitoring device.
desc: I developed a facial moisture monitoring device using a microE sensor for a clinic, where patient data is stored in a database.

name: Dam Height Measurement Instruments
desc: I am developing a dam height measurement instrument using the US-100 sensor, with the data stored in Google Spreadsheets.

name: Calorie Scale for the Visually Impaired
desc: That sounds like a very innovative and helpful solution! A calorie scale for the visually impaired with voice feedback and recommendations via a Telegram bot is an excellent application of technology. If you need assistance with any technical aspects or ideas for further development, feel free to ask!

name: BMI (Body Mass Index) Sale
desc: Design of a digital weighing and height measurement device integrated with the BMI formula to determine human body mass, based on a Telegram Bot.

name: Monitoring pH & Nutrisi Tanaman
desc: I am developing a rice plant pH and nutrition monitoring device for remote monitoring, utilizing the Ubidots platform for real-time data interface from sensors.

name: Absen RFID IoT
desc: I have created an attendance system using RFID card tap, where student attendance data is collected in a spreadsheet database.

name: Vape
desc: I am  developing an electronic cigarette using the LGTM microcontroller, which is used to generate PWM signals to activate the coil in the electronic cigarette.

name: Automatic fish feeder and pond quality monitoring device.
desc: Design of an automatic fish feeder and pond water quality monitoring device using pH and turbidity sensors, integrated with the BLYNK platform for remote monitoring.[IMAGE ILUSTRATION]

name: Detection of people using Raspberry Pi.
desc: A device for detecting people using YOLO technology, where a buzzer and LED will activate when a person is detected. Raspberry Pi is used to develop the embedded system for this detection device.

name: PWM PCB Design
desc: I designed a PCB to create an adjustable PWM module, designed with the help of EasyEDA software.

name: PCB Design
desc: I designed a PCB for an embedded system device that I have created, which is an automatic laundry service machine, designed with the help of EasyEDA software.

name: PCB Design
desc: I designed a PCB for an embedded system device that I previously created, which is a facial skin humidity monitoring tool., designed with the help of EasyEDA software.

name: Smart chicken coop system schematic.
desc: The schematic of an Internet of Things (IoT)-based poultry coop monitoring and control device. This schematic is designed to develop a prototype of a smart poultry coop that can be monitored through Telegram.

name: GPS tracker schematic.
desc: An electrical schematic design of a GPS tracker system based on a microcontroller.

name: Electrical schematic for height measurement.
desc: An electrical schematic for a height measurement system with a maximum reading limit of up to 4.5 meters.

name: Electrical schematic for a vape.
desc: Electrical schematic for an electronic cigarette design with a PWM system.

name: Electrical schematic for monitoring pH, turbidity, and nutrients.
desc: A device for a smart farming system to detect pH, turbidity, and nutrients based on the Internet of Things.

name: Electrical schematic for a smart trash bin.
desc: A smart trash bin device to detect methane gas content, waste density, and integrated with a solar panel as a power source for the microcontroller.

name: Schematic for a noise detection system.
desc: An electrical schematic for reading noise levels in decibels.

name: Down Counter Mod-15
desc: A down counter 15 is a logic gate circuit capable of performing a countdown with a 4-bit value. This circuit is a simplified version of an IC down counter.

name: **Measurement of PTC and NTC Characteristics**
desc: The circuit above is a simple circuit to determine the voltage and current characteristics of NTC and PTC, with the aim of understanding how each sensor works.

name: Light sensor module with op-amp
desc: It is a design of an op-amp sensor controlled analogically using a comparator op-amp, with the aim of understanding the analog electrical performance before the creation of digital electricity with a microcontroller.

name: quiz bell
desc: A PLC ladder diagram for a quiz bell where the fastest button press activates the buzzer and other buzzers remain off.

name: Automatic timer circuit for star-delta motor
desc: A ladder diagram to control the timer in an automatic star-delta motor circuit.

name: Timer Light Circuit
desc: A ladder diagram for an Omron PLC to activate a light for a certain period when the push button is pressed.

name: Automatic Traffic Light
desc: A ladder diagram to control traffic lights automatically with adjustable timing allows you to control the duration of each light phase (red, yellow, and green) based on your desired timing settings.

name: PLC Latch Circuit
desc: is used to maintain an output (coil) in an ON state until a reset condition is met, even if the triggering input (push button) is no longer active.

name: Remote on-off light control
desc: An Internet of Things (IoT) device that can remotely turn a light on and off through a website user interface built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, utilizing Firebase as the database.

name: Automatic light & fan control
desc: A device that can control the on-off state of a fan using an NTC 10K sensor and control the on-off state of a light using an LDR sensor. This device operates automatically based on the applied sensors.

name: Flip-Flop Lamp Circuit
desc: A single-phase electrical circuit with 2 timers, 2 contactors, and 2 auxiliary relays. Operating principle: The lamps turn on alternately every 3 seconds.

name: Sequential Lamp Circuit
desc: A sequential lamp circuit is a lamp circuit that can only be turned on in order, starting from push button 1 and then push button 2. If it starts from push button 2, the indicator lamp will not turn on.

name: OR & AND Circuit
desc: OR is an electrical circuit where pressing any push button will turn on the indicator lamp, while AND is an electrical circuit that requires pressing multiple buttons to turn on the indicator lamp.
